title: I've been everywhere
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Royal Australian Navy
abstract: Robert Flisher had grown up miles away from the sea, but when National Service came up, he followed his dreams and joined the Navy.
description: Robert Flisher was excited to leave Australia and see the world as it was his childhood dream to join the Navy. Flisher opens up about his experiences with the Navy and talks about some of the exciting places he visited during his service.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002737; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [St Arnaud Veterans]; Active; 2011
